title: Installation issue: dyninst@9.3.2 + boost, setup_dependent_package from pr #20198 breaks boost <= 1.69.0
body:
I try to install dyninst@9.3.2 but get the following error:


==> dyninst: Executing phase: 'cmake'
==> Error: AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'spec'

/home/jalcaraz/spack/var/spack/repos/builtin/packages/boost/package.py:552, in _cmake_args:
        551            def _cmake_args(self):
  >>    552                return ['-DBoost_NO_BOOST_CMAKE=ON'] + args_fn(self)




### Steps to reproduce the issue

$spack install dyninst@9.3.2

@hainest 

### General information

- [X ] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-219-0924b20
* **Python:** 2.7.5
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-sandybridge
* **Concretizer:** original

Another machine with same error:
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-230-86ae63b64
* **Python:** 3.8.2
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu20.04-skylake
* **Concretizer:** original



- [X ] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [X ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- 
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5701795/spack-build-env.txt)
[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/5701797/spack-build-out.txt)


- [ X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
